Title: Two piece Trumpet Formal Dress

----

Sku: CK22

----

Price: 

----

Saleprice: 

----

Bulkdiscount: 0

----

Sizes: 12, 8, 6, 10, 4

----

Colors: mint

----

Category: formal-gowns

----

Featured-image: CK22-mint-two-piece-trumpet-formal-dress_p.jpg

----

Description: A two piece with a sweetheart bodice and a halter neckline. The neckline, sides of the bodice, back of the bodice, and the trim of the midriff are all detailed with beading and rhinestones. The satin skirt is form fitting and flares into a trumpet skirt at the bottom.
